Feb. 28, 2016 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (Championship Section)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest oxfordshire-district-bba-winter-contest--5607
None
Championship
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Best Instrumentalist (John Hampden Shield): Brian Thomas, Soprano, Wantage
All section prizes: Best Bass Section of the Day (Webster Cup): Wantage (Angus Oliver, Dave Richards, Simon Handley - no fourth player) Best Cornet of the Day (Graham Ruecroft Memorial Trophy): Sara-Jane Humphrey, Wantage Band With Most Players Under 19 (Anne Challis Cup): Yarnton (unregistered section) Youngest Player (George Tutte Memorial Cup): Anna Hipkiss, Yarnton (unregistered section)
Jan. 6, 2016, 10:14 a.m. Feb. 29, 2016, 8:15 a.m.
